title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions: Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker! This portable speaker with a built-in microphone is perfect for all your travel, outdoor, and pool adventures. With deep, clear, and immersive audio quality, this speaker features PositionIQ technology and a custom-engineered transducer for an exceptional sound experience. Plus, it's waterproof with an IP67 rating, so it can even float on water! The compact design and utility loop make it easy to hold and store, and with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery offering up to 12 hours of playtime, you can enjoy your favorite tunes all day long. Connect with ease via Bluetooth and access Siri or Google Assistant for hands-free control. With the Bose Connect App, you can customize settings and receive software updates. Don't miss out on the ultimate portable speaker – get your Bose SoundLink Flex today!

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker for all your audio needs. Whether you're traveling, hanging out by the pool, or enjoying the great outdoors, this sleek black speaker is your perfect companion. With deep, clear, and immersive audio quality, you'll experience music like never before.

This speaker is not just stylish, it's also built to last. It's waterproof, dust-resistant, and shock-resistant, making it the perfect choice for any adventure. The built-in microphone and virtual assistant access allow you to take calls and control your device hands-free. And with a battery life of up to 12 hours, you can enjoy uninterrupted music all day long. Plus, the Bose Connect App support and customizable settings make it easy to personalize your listening experience.

Don't miss out on the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker – the ultimate wireless waterproof speaker for your on-the-go lifestyle. Get yours today and take your music to the next level!

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker! Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio with this portable speaker that comes with a built-in microphone. Whether you're traveling, enjoying the outdoors, or lounging by the pool, this waterproof speaker is the perfect companion. With PositionIQ technology and custom-engineered transducer, you'll enjoy top-notch audio quality. Plus, it's drop, dust, and shock resistant, making it ideal for any adventure. The lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime and can be easily recharged with a USB-C cable. With Siri and Google Assistant access, and app support through the Bose Connect App, this speaker is smart and customizable. Get yours today and elevate your listening experience!

Whether you're traveling, enjoying the great outdoors, or lounging by the pool, this wireless waterproof speaker is your perfect companion. With deep, clear, and immersive audio quality, plus advanced PositionIQ technology and custom-engineered transducers, you'll experience sound like never before. 

Not only is it waterproof with an IP67 rating, but it also floats on water, making it perfect for pool parties and beach days. It's designed to withstand dust, shocks, corrosion, and UV light, so you can take it wherever you go without worry. The built-in microphone and virtual assistant access make it easy to take calls and control your music hands-free. 

With up to 12 hours of battery life, USB-C charging, and a compact, portable design, the Bose SoundLink Flex is ready for all-day fun. And with the Bose Connect App, you can customize settings and receive software updates for the ultimate experience. Get your Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker today and take your music to the next level!

The Bose SoundLink Flex is the perfect blend of portability, durability, and exceptional audio quality. Get yours today and elevate your listening experience!

With deep, clear, and immersive audio quality, and exclusive PositionIQ technology, this speaker delivers an exceptional listening experience.
